EmailTemplate.name: SD Member Event 2010
EmailTemplate.subject: IAVA Event in San Diego
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings!
Thank you for signing up to attend the IAVA event this Friday night in San Diego! This is the final leg of IAVA’s California Tour, and after great stops in San Francisco and Los Angeles, we’re looking forward to keeping the momentum going in San Diego with free food and drinks, and live entertainment.
When: Friday, March 12th from 6:00 PM – 9:00 PM Where: Red Circle (420 E St, San Diego, CA 92101) - map here: http://bit.ly/atkS6M Dress Code: Smart Casual
The event will be a perfect opportunity to get to know fellow vets in the area and have a great time.
Let me know if you have any questions or won’t be able to make it.
We’re really looking forward to seeing you out there!
Best,
Blake
-- Blake Henderson Deputy Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) 292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor New York, NY 10017 www.IAVA.org
